record.field: The format for the discount formula provided "%(formula)s" is incorrect. It can only contain numeric values, and the symbols "+" "*" "/" "."
The value to be substracted as discount has incorrect format. It must be either a integer or decimal number
The amounts for the products in "buy x pay y" discount "%(element)s" are not valid.
The percentage provided for discount must be between 0 and 100, it is "%(element)s" instead.
